chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Rhea Avin, p. 31 (29)—Pretty, round-faced woman from the Two Rivers. She has dark hair that she has had braided for four years, and is about five years older than Faile. She and Sharmad Zeffar are fighting over Wil al'Seen. See also al'Seen, Wil; Zeffar, Sharmad.
